text: Lee Julian Rogers (born 21 October 1966) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for Chesterfield, in non-League football for Gainsborough Trinity, and was on the books of Doncaster Rovers without making a league appearance. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Doncaster Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Lee Rogers (footballer, born 1966)
